channel.title: cs.SC updates on arXiv.org

item.title: Terracini matroids: algebraic matroids of secants and embedded joins
item.description: arXiv:2511.03389v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: Applications of algebraic geometry have sparked much recent work on algebraic matroids. An algebraic matroid encodes algebraic dependencies among coordinate functions on a variety. We study the behavior of algebraic matroids under joins and secants of varieties. Motivated by Terracini's lemma, we introduce the notion of a Terracini union of matroids, which captures when the algebraic matroid of a join coincides with the matroid union of the algebraic matroids of its summands. We illustrate applications of our results with a discussion of the implications for toric surfaces and threefolds.
item.dc:creator: Fatemeh Mohammadi, Jessica Sidman, Louis Theran
